titles: The Lords-day, or, A succinct narration compiled out of the testimonies of H. Scripture and the reverend ancient fathers and divided into two books : in the former whereof is declared, that the observation of the Lords Day was from the Apostles ... : in the later is shewn in what things its sanctification doth consist ... / lately translated out of the Latine.
author: Young, Thomas, 1587-1655.
Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.
publisher: Printed by E. Leach, and are to be sold by Nevil Symmons ...,
notes: Half-title: Dies dominica, or, The Lords day.
Attributed to Thomas Young. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
"Epistle dedicatory" signed: Theophilus Philo-kuriaces Loncardiensis [i.e. Thomas Young].
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
